Name: Shooty Squad
About the game: Shooty Squad is a fast paced, competitive first person shooter with hilarious graphics and ragdoll physics. With a variety of guns from machine guns, snipers or even RPG's. Beating your opponent will take not only quick reflexes, but being smart about how you play ! Learning the location and advantages of each gun, will be the key to winning against your opponents. Each map has been designed with keeping the game as balanced as possible. Each map will have its own unique flow and personality !
Meta Title: Shooty Squad: Aug 17, 2017, Liam Doherty and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shooty Squad? Check out the release date (Aug 17, 2017), developer insights from Liam Doherty, and a complete game summary.
